description: This 5 Ingredient Spicy Margherita Pizza is a fun twist on the Italian classic. Super easy, ready in 15 minutes and an unexpected addition to your Cinco de Mayo menu
name: 5 Ingredient Spicy Margherita Pizza
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup homemade or store bought pizza sauce
3.5 oz Sincerely Brigitte Chipotle Cheese, shredded
4-5 red grape tomatoes, sliced in half
4-5 yellow grape tomatoes, sliced in half

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 425 F. Line a large baking sheet with aluminum foil
Spread pizza sauce evenly on the crust and sprinkle cheese. Arrange the tomatoes and basil on top and bake for 10 minutes. Serve warm
